response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. Given its significance to you, I believe it's only fair to extend this offer with respect and transparency. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the market value but also acknowledges the personal importance of the item to you. I am confident that this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value of the product for both parties. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have any questions. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
